_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The fuel for ignorance [an10.61:9.2]: The factor of associating with bad people
Lack of mindfulness and situational awareness
The fuel for knowledge and freedom (a ca: The factor of associating with good people
The three kinds of good conduct
The four kinds of mindfulness meditation
